articles.author: Anthony Faiola, Susannah George, Stefano Pitrelli, Dan Lamothe
articles.title: Italy releases Iranian wanted in deadly drone strike on U.S. troops - The Washington Post
articles.description: The United States says Mohammad Abedini provided technology used by Iran in a drone strike that killed three service members in Jordan last year.
articles.content:
Italy on Sunday released an Iranian engineer who is wanted by the United States over a drone strike last year that killed three U.S. service members in Jordan.
Mohammad Abedini arrived in Iran on Su… [+4040 chars]
